description:
On the day of the Tennomifune Academy entrance ceremony, in the class 1-7 classroom, Hanakoizumi Anne (Hanako), Hibarigaoka Ruri (Hibar), and Kumegawa Botan (Botan) are told by their homeroom teacher Kodaira-sensei that they are unfortunate and unhappy students.
The goal of the students of class 1-7, who are burdened by a variety of forms of misfortune, is to become happy.
The three girls have trouble accepting their circumstances, but they`re immediately given an unexpected assignment...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 7 avril, jour de rentrée des pas de chance
April 7: An Unfortunate First Day of School
Shigatsu Nanoka: Fukou na Nyuugaku Shonichi
四月七日 不幸な入学初日
